title: REMASTERED – Episode 29: The Big Chill
itunes:title: REMASTERED – Episode 29: The Big Chill
description:
In this Remastered edition of a fan favorite, we return to the frozen coast of Maine, and the haunting stories that flood its shores. With a new score from Chad Lawson, fresh narration and production, and a brand new bonus story at the end, this is one you don’t want to miss.

Lore Resources: 

  • Episode Music: lorepodcast.com/music 
  • Episode Sources: lorepodcast.com/sources 
  • All the shows from Grim & Mild: www.grimandmild.com

©2022 Aaron Mahnke. All rights reserved.

Access premium content!: https://www.patreon.com/lorepodcast
